Rank.Description: Increases your Armor by 3%.
Increases your Armor by 6%.
Increases your Armor by 9%.
Increases your Armor by 12%.
Increases your Armor by 15%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 2%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 6%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 8%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 10%.
Increases your Endurance by 2%.
Increases your Endurance by 4%.
Increases your Endurance by 6%.
Increases your Endurance by 8%.
Increases your Endurance by 10%.

Ability.Description: Deals 218 to 241 damage. Reduces damage taken by 2% for 20s. Generates additional threat. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: All healing effects on you are increased by 2%. Whenever you kill a target, you heal for 50% of your Attack Power over 10s.
All healing effects on you are increased by 4%. Whenever you kill a target, you heal for 100% of your Attack Power over 10s.
All healing effects on you are increased by 6%. Whenever you kill a target, you heal for 150% of your Attack Power over 10s.
Reduces the damage you take from spells by 5%.
Reduces the damage you take from spells by 10%.
Reduces the damage you take from spells by 15%.
The damage Rift Guard absorbs is reflected back to the enemy.

Ability.Description: Applies Rift Guard whenever Guarded Steel or a teleport is used. Absorbs 5% of damage taken up to 50% of the Rogue's Maximum Health for 30s.

Rank.Description: Whenever Guarded Steel or a Plane Shift ability is executed, the Rogue gains an absorption shield that lasts up to 30 seconds. This shield absorbs 5% of all incoming damage for up to 50% of the Rogue's current maximum health.
Using a Combo Point generating ability that gives the 5th Combo Point or when you already have 5 Combo Points adds a buff, increasing damage done by 2%. Lasts 30s. Stacks up to 1 time.
Using a Combo Point generating ability that gives the 5th Combo Point or when you already have 5 Combo Points adds a buff, increasing damage done by 2%. Lasts 30s. Stacks up to 2 times.
Using a Combo Point generating ability that gives the 5th Combo Point or when you already have 5 Combo Points adds a buff, increasing damage done by 2%. Lasts 30s. Stacks up to 3 times.
Using a Combo Point generating ability that gives the 5th Combo Point or when you already have 5 Combo Points adds a buff, increasing damage done by 2%. Lasts 30s. Stacks up to 4 times.
Using a Combo Point generating ability that gives the 5th Combo Point or when you already have 5 Combo Points adds a buff, increasing damage done by 2%. Lasts 30s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 5% for 10 seconds after Plane Shifting.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 10% for 10 seconds after Plane Shifting.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 15% for 10 seconds after Plane Shifting.
Increases the incoming damage Rift Guard absorbs by an additional 2% and the total amount of damage it can absorb to 70% of the Rogue's maximum health.

Ability.Description: Teleports to the enemy. Deals 415 to 459 damage. Awards 2 Combo Points.

Rank.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Plane Shift abilities by 10 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of your Plane Shift abilities by 20 seconds.

Whenever you take damage, while below 30% health, you gain an absorb shield for up to 20 seconds, absorbing 5% damage up to an amount equal to 5% of your Maximum Health. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

Whenever you take damage, while below 30% health, you gain an absorb shield for up to 20 seconds, absorbing 10% damage up to an amount equal to 10% of your Maximum Health. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

Whenever you take damage, while below 30% health, you gain an absorb shield for up to 20 seconds, absorbing 15% damage up to an amount equal to 15% of your Maximum Health. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.
Increases your movement speed by 25% for 4 seconds after Plane Shifting. This effect can only be triggered once every 10 seconds.
Increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 seconds after Plane Shifting. This effect can only be triggered once every 10 seconds.

Whenever you Plane Shift, you gain Planar Vortex that lasts 8 seconds. This effect deals 50% of your weapon's damage every second to up to 10 enemies and generates a large amount of threat. This effect can only be triggered when you are in Guardian Phase.

Ability.Description: Prevents all action while granting immunity to all abilities for 6s.

Rank.Description: Increases your Resists by 3%.
Increases your Resists by 6%.
Increases your Resists by 9%.
Increases your Resists by 12%.
Increases your Resists by 15%.

Ability.Description: Reduces the damage of Planar Strike and Phantom Blow by 20%. Causes Planar Strike and Phantom Blow to deal weapon damage to up to 10 enemies.
Increases damage and healing done by 5% and reduces threat generation by 50%. Increases damage and healing done by an additional 15% for 10s after Plane Shifting.

Rank.Description: Increases Endurance bonus from Guardian Phase by 5%.
Increases Endurance bonus from Guardian Phase by 10%.
Increases Endurance bonus from Guardian Phase by 15%.
Increases your Deflect chance by 1% and reduces the damage you take when deflecting by 1%.
Increases your Deflect chance by 2% and reduces the damage you take when deflecting by 2%.
Increases your Deflect chance by 3% and reduces the damage you take when deflecting by 3%.
Increases your Deflect chance by 4% and reduces the damage you take when deflecting by 4%.
Increases your Deflect chance by 5% and reduces the damage you take when deflecting by 5%.

Ability.Description:
Deals additional damage per Combo Point to up to 10 enemies. Reduces the Hit chance by 5% for 15s on each enemy hit. Generates additional threat.
1 Point: 113 damage 2 Points: 151 damage 3 Points: 201 damage 4 Points: 258 damage 5 Points: 327 damage

Rank.Description: Heals you for 10% of your Maximum Health over 20 seconds after Plane Shifting.

AbilityRank.Description: Increases Endurance by 1.5%, increases Armor by 2%, increases Resist by 2.5% and increases damage done by 0.5% for each point spent in the Riftstalker soul.

Buffs the Rogue for a duration based on Combo Points, causing them to gain a stacking buff, each time they Dodge, Deflect or Parry an attack, increasing their Weapon Damage and Attack Power by 5% for 20s. 10 stacks Maximum.
1 Point: 20s 2 Points: 30s 3 Points: 40s 4 Points: 50s 5 Points: 60s

Each time Planar Strike or Phantom Blow is used, the Rogue gains Soul Synthesis, increasing damage by 1%. This buff stacks up to 20 times. Soul Coalescence consumes Soul Synthesis, causing the Rogue to take 1% less damage per stack for 4s.
Causes the Rogue to deal 25% more damage but take 25% more damage. Toggled ability. Lasts until canceled.
Buffs the Rogue, absorbing up to 50% of the Rogue's maximum Health. Upon expiration, heals the Rogue based on the amount of the absorb shield remaining. Lasts 10s.
